snippet.title: Boulder Dash® Ultimate Collection - Official Trailer (ESRB)
snippet.description:
Two amazing iterations of THE 80s’ action puzzler for Nintendo Switch! ⛏

The Boulder Dash® Ultimate Collection delivers both, the fresh 2021 relaunch, Boulder Dash® Deluxe™ and Boulder Dash® 30th Anniversary™, with a combined number of more than 400 levels! 💥

For more information, visit:
https://www.iningames.com/games/boulder-dash-ultimate-collection/
